recipe.title: Spiked Apple Cider Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 3 ; gala apples, or fuji apples, cored and cubed

steps.step: Add the apple cider, cinnamon sticks, and allspice berries to a slow cooker. Turn the heat setting to high, cover, and warm for 30-60 minutes, or until steaming. Once steaming, reduce the heat setting to warm.
Add the apples and rum and stir to combine.
Ladle into mugs and garnish with cinnamon sticks.
